description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国及中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和创始人之一，中国近代革命家、军事家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之首。
description.en: One of the main founders and creators of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. A modern Chinese revolutionary, military strategist, and the foremost of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事家、理论家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, military strategist, and theorist, who was the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，中国人民解放军的创建人之一。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military strategist, and diplomat, one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义理论家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese Marxist theorist, and a former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代政治家、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅。曾任中共中央副主席、中华人民共和国国务院副总理、中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military leader, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创建者与领导者之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, military commander, and diplomat, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱德的第六任妻子，中国妇女解放运动的领导人。
description.en: The sixth wife of Zhu De and a leader of the women's liberation movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 朱德的独子。
description.en: The only son of Zhu De.

description.zh-cn: 朱德的女儿，曾任北京师范大学俄语系教授。
description.en: The daughter of Zhu De, a former professor in the Russian Department at Beijing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 朱德的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Zhu De.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代一所著名的军事院校。
description.en: A famous modern military academy in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国哥廷根的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Göttingen, Germany.

nodes.id: 东方劳动者共产主义大学

zh-cn: 东方劳动者共产主义大学
en: Communist University of the Toilers of the East

description.zh-cn: 苏联为殖民地和附属国培训共产主义干部的学校。
description.en: A Soviet school for training communist cadres from colonial and dependent countries.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党为反击国民党而发动的武装起义，标志着中共独立领导武装斗争和创建军队的开始。
description.en: An armed uprising launched by the Communist Party of China in response to the Kuomintang, marking the beginning of the CCP's independent leadership of armed struggle and army creation.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移，奠定了中国革命胜利的基础。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which laid the foundation for the victory of the Chinese revolution.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30至40年代，中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: The war fought in the 1930s and 1940s in which China resisted the full-scale invasion by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场全国性政治运动。
description.en: A nationwide political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，由中国工农红军主力改编的国民革命军部队。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army formed from the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人之一及首任总书记。
description.en: A main founder and the first General Secretary of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，哲学家、政治活动家。
description.en: One of the founders of the Communist Party of China, a philosopher and political activist.

en: Fourth Red Army of the First Front Army

description.zh-cn: 由朱德和毛泽东的部队在井冈山会师后组成的红军部队。
description.en: A Red Army unit formed after the rendezvous of Zhu De's and Mao Zedong's forces at Jinggangshan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长征途中召开的一次重要会议，确立了毛泽东在党和红军中的领导地位。
description.en: An important conference held by the Communist Party of China during the Long March, which established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the party and the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中共中央在庐山召开的政治局扩大会议和八届八中全会，会上对彭德怀等人进行了批判。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo and the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee held by the CPC Central Committee in Lushan in 1959, during which Peng Dehuai and others were criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党总裁。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military leader, who served as the President of the Republic of China and the Director-General of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，因在文化大革命中的罪行而受到批判。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, criticized for his crimes during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，文化大革命期间“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the 'Gang of Four' during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Agrarian Revolutionary War.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关常设机关的领导人。
description.en: The leader of the permanent body of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1956年至1982年间中国共产党设置的领导职务，仅次于中共中央主席。
description.en: A leading position within the Communist Party of China from 1956 to 1982, second only to the Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记
中共中央纪律检查委员会书记
en: Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会的主要负责人。
description.en: The principal responsible person of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总司令

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总司令
en: Commander-in-Chief of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥官职位，1954年废止。
description.en: The highest military command position of the People's Liberation Army, abolished in 1954.

relationships.target: 东方劳动者共产主义大学

description.zh-cn: 与张申府一同在德国柏林介绍朱德加入中国共产党。
description.en: Together with Zhang Shenfu, introduced Zhu De to join the Communist Party of China in Berlin, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 与周恩来一同在德国柏林介绍朱德加入中国共产党。
description.en: Together with Zhou Enlai, introduced Zhu De to join the Communist Party of China in Berlin, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在上海初次会面时，因认为朱德军阀气息太重而拒绝其入党申请。
description.en: During their first meeting in Shanghai, rejected Zhu De's application to join the party, believing he had too much of a warlord air.

description.zh-cn: 以国民革命军第九军副军长、南昌市公安局长身份参与指挥南昌起义。
description.en: Participated in and commanded the Nanchang Uprising as the Deputy Commander of the Ninth Army of the National Revolutionary Army and the Director of the Nanchang Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 率领南昌起义和湘南起义的部队，在井冈山与毛泽东领导的秋收起义部队会师。
description.en: Led the troops from the Nanchang and Southern Hunan uprisings to rendezvous with Mao Zedong's Autumn Harvest Uprising troops at Jinggangshan.

description.zh-cn: 与毛泽东一同将井冈山会师的两支部队合编为工农革命军第四军。
description.en: Together with Mao Zedong, merged the two forces that met at Jinggangshan into the Fourth Army of the Workers' and Peasants' Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 与朱德一同将井冈山会师的两支部队合编为工农革命军第四军。
description.en: Together with Zhu De, merged the two forces that met at Jinggangshan into the Fourth Army of the Workers' and Peasants' Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中，反对张国焘率部南下、另立中央的分裂行为。
description.en: During the Long March, opposed Zhang Guotao's divisive actions of leading troops south and establishing a separate central committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国工农红军总司令，参与领导了长征。
description.en: As the Commander-in-Chief of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, he participated in leading the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议确立了毛泽东在党和红军中的领导地位，朱德在会上支持了毛泽东的主张。
description.en: The Zunyi Conference established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the party and the Red Army; Zhu De supported Mao's proposals at the meeting.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，任改编后的八路军（后称第十八集团军）总指挥/总司令。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, he served as the Commander-in-Chief of the reorganized Eighth Route Army (later known as the 18th Group Army).

description.zh-cn: 作为八路军总司令，指挥部队在华北敌后开辟根据地，开展游击战争。
description.en: As the Commander-in-Chief of the Eighth Route Army, he commanded troops to open up base areas and conduct guerrilla warfare behind enemy lines in North China.

description.zh-cn: 与彭德怀、左权共同部署了八路军的百团大战。
description.en: Together with Peng Dehuai and Zuo Quan, he planned the Hundred Regiments Offensive of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 朱德是中国人民解放军的主要缔造者之一。
description.en: Zhu De is one of the main founders of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总司令

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议期间，因朱德在批判彭德怀时肯定其积极一面，而批评朱德“未抓到痒处”。
description.en: During the Lushan Conference, criticized Zhu De for 'not scratching the itch' because Zhu affirmed Peng Dehuai's positive side while criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议及文化大革命期间多次批判朱德，称其为“老野心家”、“党内危险的定时炸弹”。
description.en: Repeatedly criticized Zhu De during the Lushan Conference and the Cultural Revolution, calling him an 'old careerist' and a 'dangerous time bomb within the party'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，朱德受到林彪、康生、江青等人的批判和政治迫害，其在中央政治局常委中的排名下降。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhu De was criticized and politically persecuted by Lin Biao, Kang Sheng, Jiang Qing, and others, and his ranking in the Politburo Standing Committee was lowered.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，授意造反派称朱德是“大野心家、大军阀、黑司令”，对其进行政治迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, she instructed rebels to label Zhu De as a 'great careerist, great warlord, black commander,' subjecting him to political persecution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期，与林彪一同批判朱德，称其“有野心”、“想黄袍加身”。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, he, along with Lin Biao, criticized Zhu De, claiming he was 'ambitious' and 'wanted to wear the yellow robe'.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
中华人民共和国副主席
中国共产党中央委员会副主席
中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记

description.zh-cn: 在南昌起义失败后，与陈毅共同整顿部队，后一同发动湘南起义并率部上井冈山，长期并肩作战。
description.en: After the failure of the Nanchang Uprising, he reorganized the troops with Chen Yi, later jointly launched the Southern Hunan Uprising, and led the troops to Jinggangshan, fighting side by side for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 长期作为军事搭档，共同指挥了多次重要战役。在1959年庐山会议上，朱德因发言肯定彭德怀的积极面而受到毛泽东批评。
description.en: Served as long-term military partners, jointly commanding numerous important campaigns. At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Zhu De was criticized by Mao Zedong for affirming Peng Dehuai's positive aspects in his speech.
